messages.subject: Katana sharpness question
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I have a question re: the sharpness of an ancient sword. I m getting ready to teach a class about ancient Japan and that naturally includes Samurai
messages.messageBody:
Hi all, I have a question re: the sharpness of an ancient sword. I'm
getting ready to teach a class about ancient Japan and that naturally
includes Samurai legend, lore, and also, facts.
I heard of a sword that holds the record for cutting through people.
It was either 5 or 7 bodies that the sword cut in half. I am having no
luck finding info about this. All I have found is a few references to
executions of this manner(rio-kuruma), but not much else.
If anyone has any info on where I could look, it would be most
helpful..
thanks..
ab...
